DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergo hip scope procedure recruit study . They randomize either receive nerve block nerve block ( pain medicine ) . Pain level clinical outcome assess 3 month post-operatively .
DOC.brief_title: Hip Scope Fascia-iliaca ( FI ) Block Study
DOC.criteria: Scheduled outpatient hip arthroscopy American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) 13 Prior surgery ipsilateral hip ASA 46 Chronic narcotic usage 6 month equivalent 20mg morphine per day Current prior placement spinal cord stimulator intrathecal pump pain control purpose Allergy amide local anesthetic Contraindication regional anesthesia BMI > 40 Females pregnant plan get pregnant course study
